description:
Refer to the [Icons](/components/icons/) section of the documentation
regarding the available icon options.

type.name: chained

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

color.description: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.

disabled.description: If `true`, the button will be disabled.

disableFocusRipple.description:
If `true`, the  keyboard focus ripple will be disabled.
`disableRipple` must also be true.

disableRipple.description: If `true`, the ripple effect will be disabled.

edge.description:
If given, uses a negative margin to counteract the padding on one
side (this is often helpful for aligning the left or right
side of the icon with content above or below, without ruining the border
size and shape).

size.description:
The size of the button.
`small` is equivalent to the dense button styling.

name: IconButton

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.edgeStart: Styles applied to the root element if `edge="start"`.
descriptions.edgeEnd: Styles applied to the root element if `edge="end"`.
descriptions.colorInherit: Styles applied to the root element if `color="inherit"`.
descriptions.colorPrimary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="primary"`.
descriptions.colorSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="secondary"`.
descriptions.disabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
descriptions.sizeSmall: Styles applied to the root element if `size="small"`.
descriptions.label: Styles applied to the children container element.
